item.title: NAILED: Hard Music Radio - Episode 1
item.description:
Playlist:

  1. Kover – Buying Time (Engineer Records)
  2. Rise Against – Gethsamane (Thick Records)
  3. Wipers – Tragedy (Zeno Records)
  4. Throttlerod – Clean (Small Stone Records)
  5. Seven Storey Mountain – Reson For Rhyme (Thick Records)
  6. Black Cock – A Fast One (Australian Cattle God)
  7. La Plebe – Que Barbaridad (Koolarrow Records)
  8. Devil Eyes – Rip My Heart Out (Signed By Force)
  9. No No Zero – Beat The Shit Out Of Me (Signed By Force)
  10. Tsigoti – (Yes) The Border Crossed Us (ESP-Disk)
  11. Manikin – Fumes (Super Secret Records)
  12. Pre – Haircut Tacos (Skin Graft)
  13. Red Mass – Weird Mass (Semprini)
  14. The Methadones – Premature Mid-Life Crisis (Thick Records)
  15. Trigger Effect – Angry Morons (Signed By Force)
  16. House of Broken Promises – The Hurt (Paid My Dues) (Small Stone Records)
  17. Wipers – Over The Edge (Zeno Records)

item.title: NAIL Jazz Radio - Episode 1
item.description:
Playlist:

  1. Eri Yamamoto Trio - Secret Link (AUM Fidelity)
  2. Charles Tyler Ensemble - Lacy's Out East (ESP-Disk)
  3. The Othertet - Naptown/Trenton (Engine Records)
  4. Akira Sakata & Chikamorachi - With Saigyo Path (Family Vineyard)
  5. Henry Threadgill's Zooid - After Some Time (Pi Recordings)
  6. Phil Ranelin & Tribe Renaissance - A Tear In Elmina (Wide Hive)
  7. Sun Ra - Dancing In The Sun (ESP-Disk)
  8. Steve Lehman Octet - Rudreshm (Pi Recordings)
  9. Darius Jones Trio - Cry Out (AUM Fidelity)
  10. Guano Padano - El Divino (Important Records)

item.title: NAIL Christmas Megamix!
item.description:
Happy Holidays from NAIL!

We here at NAIL have compiled a crazy mix of Christmas music for you all. This is definitely not your average Christmas music CD.

Check it out!

Playlist:

  1. Christmas Day  - Christopher Smith (Boompa Records)
  2. Navidad Negra  - Las Rubias Del Norte (Barbes Records)
  3. Xmas in Yr Neighborhood - Sugar & Gold (Antenna Farm Records)
  4. Gloria In Excelsis  - ESSO Trinidad Steel Band (Bananastan Records)
  5. What Do You Get A Wookie For Christmas  - Savanteous Q. Malmsteen (Chicken Ranch Records)
  6. Christmastime - The Nourallah Brothers (Western Vinyl)
  7. The Christmas Song -Adam Arcuragi (High Two Recordings)
  8. The Coventry Carol - I Was Totally Destroying It (Greyday Records)
  9. Hazy Winter - Tia Carerra (Small Stone Records)
  10. Emmanuel - The Out_Circuit (Lujo Records)
  11. Why Santa (Santarchy) - New Black (Thick Records)
  12. Christmas 2012 - The Dead Beats (Standard Recording Co)
  13. Silent Night - Suffering & The Hideous Thieves (Lujo Records)
item.dc:creator: NAIL Radio
item.itunes:summary:

item.description:
1. Armageddon – David Thomas Owen IV (Esperanza Plantation)
  2. LA-ish – Kosha Dillz (Shemspeed/Modular Moods)
  3. The Herdsman – Bluebrain (Lujo Records)
  4. Hey Sunshine – Tall Tales & The Silver Lining (Beehouse Records)

item.title: World's Edge Radio - Episode 1
item.description:
Playlist:

  1. Hold My Hips – Dengue Fever (M80 Sounds)
  2. As For The Little Gray Rabbit – Barbez! (Important Records)
  3. Wise Kid Song – Warsaw Village Band (Barbes Records)
  4. Cecilia – Esso Trinidad Steel Band (Bananastan Records)
  5. Havah Nagilah (Cha-Cha) – Juan Calle & His Latin Lantzmen (Idelsohn Society)
  6. Taketron – Slavic Soul Party (Barbes Records)
